duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the day-to-day operations of the branch and create a positive working environment for staff, customers, temporary employees, and applicants.
Manage, motivate, train, and provide ongoing development to internal staff members.
Meet or exceed branch goals through the development and execution of the branch business plan.
Create and maintain a recruiting plan utilizing various media and non-media resources.
Maintain and further develop client relationships and sell the company’s full product life cycle of services to new and existing clients.

Manage P&L of the branch, report on all sales and operations, and provide support with the day-to-day operations of the branch, including recruiting/sourcing, interviews, onboarding, and compliance and regulatory items.
Work in a fast-paced and changing environment with rapidly changing priorities.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years direct managerial experience with profit/loss responsibilities.
Recruiting, Human Resources, or Customer Service experience preferred.
Bachelor's degree in Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
